title: Build Visual Q&A System
description: Create a system that answers questions about images
instructions:
Implement visual Q&A system:
1. `answerImageQuestion(imageBase64, question)`: Answer single question
   - Combine image and question in prompt
   - Get focused answer from Claude
   - Return concise response

2. `batchImageQA(imageBase64, questions)`: Handle multiple questions
   - Process all questions for same image
   - Maintain context across questions
   - Return array of answers

Optimize for accuracy and relevance.

testCases.input: typeof await answerImageQuestion(mockImage, 'What colors are visible?')

hints: For batch: can make separate API calls or single call with all questions
